resources.string: " You only need to enter the parameters, without adding ffmpeg. Each command is separated by a space. Do not include spaces in the path of the input / output file, otherwise the command will not be recognized correctly!"
The device does not support it!
To use this feature, you need to download an additional data packet that does not exceed 20MB. Do you want to download it now?
If you do not download the data package, it will not work properly!
